alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; Goshen County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 5:20PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Kimball, southwestern Banner, southeastern Albany, southwestern Goshen and Laramie Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 519 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Hawk Springs Recreation Area to 6 miles west of Gun Barrel to 9 miles southeast of Whitaker to near Federal to near Horse Creek to near Yellow Pine Campground. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Highway weather stations recorded wind gusts 50-55 mph along I-25 south of Chugwater. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, Pine Bluffs, Burns, Albin, South Greeley, Federal, Vedauwoo Campground, North Crow Campground, Ranchettes, Granite Springs Campground, Warren AFB, Frontier Park, North Cheyenne, Horse Creek, Gun Barrel, Hillsdale, Crystal Lake Reservoir, Crystal Lake Campground, Buford and Granite Springs Reservoir. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 1 and 39. Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 331 and 402. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; Goshen County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
